altTitles.ja: 未だ亡くなっていない人

altTitles.en: Wives Who have not Yet Passed Away
Wives Who Has Not Yet Passed Away

description.en: Haruka Kawarazaki, a young man aspiring to be a manga artist, and Mayuko Kawarazaki, a beautiful woman to whom everyone looks back. They live in a room in a flat, share a meal every night and lay on each other's skin. But they are not husband and wife. A woman whose heart has been broken and a young man who knows it but continues their relationship - a love suspense about a forbidden relationship that you can't stop even when you know it's wrong.
description.ja:
兄は逝き、義姉は壊れ、僕は溺れた

漫画家を目指す青年･河原崎遥と、誰もが振り返る美女･河原崎繭子。共に暮らし、毎夜、食事を共にし、肌を重ねる。しかし、二人は夫婦ではない。繭子は、遥の義姉。死んだ兄の妻なのだ。心が壊れてしまった女と、それを知りながら関係を続ける男―――
description.pt-br: A história segue o jovem aspirante a mangaká, **Haruka Kawarazaki**, e a deslumbrante, **Mayuko Kawarazaki**, que atrai a atenção de todos. Os dois vivem juntos em um apartamento, compartilham refeições todas as noites e satisfazem todos seus desejos carnais sobre a cama. No entanto, eles não são um casal. Uma mulher cujo coração foi partido e um jovem que sabe disso, mas que continua a sua relação. *― Um suspense romântico que retrata um relacionamento proibido que não pode ser interrompido, mesmo sabendo que é errado.*

altTitles.ja: 彼岸のオルカ

description.en: Marlin Trout  is an organization established to stop suicides in Japan, where the number of suicides has drastically increased due to the development of society. Wakame, a slightly natural staff member, is constantly pushed around by her uncooperative partner, Umi. They are the best buddies with the best record, but they have a certain "history" together...?

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

altTitles.ja: スマイリー

description.en: Yuushi Kamome is a freelance writer who lost his beloved daughter in an accident. In despair, his wife leaves him, and he spends his days like a shell of a man. One day, however, a flyer from a strange religious group, the "Heart Laughing Society," changes his fate. It shows the image of his wife, whom he has lost touch with...This is a story of faith and madness. What is the black darkness of the cult that an evil smile invites? A chilling “new religion” suspense begins!
description.ru:
Томодзи Камомэ — писатель-фрилансер, потерявший любимую дочь в результате несчастного случая. В отчаянии от него уходит жена, и он проводит свои дни в одиночестве, закрывшись от внешнего мира.
Однако однажды листовка странной религиозной группы «Общество смеющегося сердца» меняет его судьбу. В ней он увидел свою жену, с которой потерял связь...

altTitles.ja: だぶるぷれい

description.en:
Having forgotten his keys, Tamao Hiroi a high-school student, returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed… Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura, one year younger, softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door. He is soon found out though and a strange 'master/slave' relationship begins!


---

altTitles.ja: ミュータントサブ

description.en:
The loneliness and sadness of a boy, Sabu, who has awakened to paranormal abilities.... 
In prehistoric times, humans had the mental ability to speak with their hearts and minds instead of words. 
Following the development of language ability, the ability that should have degenerated is revived!? 
A transfusion of blood from a girl awakens the psychic powers of a boy, Mutant Sabu, and he is born! 
The short series about a hero with unusual abilities is now ready to begin!

---- 
- **1966 7th Kodansha Children's Manga Award winner, shared with Ishinomori's very famous other work Cyborg 009**

altTitles.ja: フェイト/エクストラ

description.en: In cyberspace the battle between magicians unfold. "Fate" might not be "Fate", and now, the new Holy Grail War has begun! Based of the PSP game of the same name, "Fate/Extra"

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about an old ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.

altTitles.ja: 宇崎ちゃんは遊びたい!

description.en: Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
description.pt:
A vida diária de um quieto universitário que só quer ficar sozinho, que começou a ser zombado pela sua Kouhai "Fofa! Mas irritante!".  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/syokumutaiman)
description.pt-br:
A vida diária de um quieto universitário que só quer ficar sozinho, que começou a ser zombado pela sua Kouhai "Fofa! Mas irritante!".

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 4, Cap 35. ]

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

title.en: Isso Anata ga Todome wo Sashite

altTitles.ja: いっそあなたがトドメを刺して

altTitles.ja-ro: Isso Anata ga Todome o Sashite

altTitles.en: Better You Give Me The Final Blow

description.en:
Ichika is a female college student who wants to have a normal relationship, but is often judged by her appearance. One night at a drinking party she attended, hoping to have a wonderful encounter, she met Kousei who was kind to her. She is attracted to him because they got the same interest, enjoys talking with him and he likes her just the way she is — but she didn't know he had a secret no one knows about. 

(Source: heartbuzz2d)
description.pt-br: Ichika é uma estudante universitária do sexo feminino que deseja ter um relacionamento normal, mas muitas vezes é julgada pela sua aparência. Uma noite, numa festa em que ela participou, esperando ter um encontro maravilhoso, ela conheceu Kousei, que foi gentil com ela. Ela se sente atraída por ele porque eles têm os mesmos interesses, gosta de conversar com ele e ele gosta dela do jeito que ela é — mas ela não sabia que ele tinha um segredo que ninguém conhece.

altTitles.ja: 旅する天使ちゃん
Angel Beats!  旅する天使ちゃん

description.en: Kanade Tachibana is a cute girl who is called "Tenshi-chan" at school. She traveled all over the country in search of "someone". During her travels, when she stops by Kanagawa, she meets Yuri Nakamura, a lively and cheerful girl. People who look a lot like SSS members also appear on the road!? Will Angel be able to find "a certain person"...?
description.vi:
Đây là một spin-off của "Angel Beats!".

Tachibana Kanade là một cô gái xinh xắn được các bạn ở trường gọi là "Thiên sứ-chan". Cô đang du hành xuyên Nhật Bản để tìm kiếm "một ai đó". Dọc đường, khi đi ngang qua Kanagawa, cô gặp một cô nàng năng nổ và vui tính tên Nakamura Yuri.

Những người giống hệt các thành viên của chiến tuyến SSS cũng sẽ xuất hiện trong chuyến du hành của Thiên sứ-chan. Liệu cuối cùng cô sẽ có thể tao ngộ cùng "ai đó"?

altTitles.en: The Reality of a Co-ed High School

altTitles.ja: 共学高校のゲンジツ

description.en: A comedic take on the daily lives of students in a co-ed high school.
description.ja:
チャンスなら転がっている！！ちょっとだけドキドキする……でも、進展しない！！盛り上がりそうで盛り上がらない毎日を悶々と過ごす男女の人間模様を描く、全く新しい草食系恋愛コメディー。

---

Chansunara korogatte iru!! Chotto dake dokidoki suru…… demo, shinten shinai!! Moriagari-sōde moriagaranai mainichi o monmon to sugosu danjo no ningen moyō o kaku, mattaku atarashī sōshoku-kei ren'ai komedī.

title.en: Lycoris Recoil Koushiki Comic Anthology: Reload

altTitles.ja: リコリス・リコイル 公式コミックアンソロジー リロード

altTitles.ja-ro: Lycoris Recoil Koushiki Comic Anthology: Reload

altTitles.en: Lycoris Recoil Official Comic Anthology: Reload

altTitles.ja: 嫌がってるキミが好き

altTitles.en: I Like You With That Look of Repulsion

description.en:
It finally happened, Shirakawa Mikoto was confessed to for the first time in her life! Otsuki Makoto wasn’t exactly her ideal man but, she wanted to have a boyfriend to show off to her friends. It turns out dating someone you don’t even know can be complicated, especially if they are a bit strange.  
This is a raunchy, heart pounding love story. Expect goosebumps and some doki doki action on the side.

A pure yin descendant destined to be a ghost bride is actually a man! Repeated warnings not to escape a marriage predestined by fate and a Lord demanding for love! One desperately wants to run away, one ghost desperately wants to pursue his wife. Waiting for the fate of loving and killing each other in the previous life to finally be revealed. Can the emotions of the two be restored as before?

title.en: The Secret of the Partner Next to You

description.en: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
description.ko:
평범한 남자 고등학생 양기룡.
그리고 언제나 헤실헤실하고 가끔 나사빠진 행동을 하는
그의 짝꿍 유재경.
그럭저럭 귀엽다고 생각되는 반 친구였을 뿐인데..
어느 날 우연히 그녀의 위험한 비밀을 알게 된다.
이 심장의 두근거림은 두려움인지, 설렘인지..?
description.es-la: Yang Kiryong es un chico de preparatoria común y corriente, que tiene una compañera de clase llamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, la cual es algo torpe y despistada. Ambos tienen una muy buena amistad, pero sin ningún tipo de atracción amorosa. Hasta que un día, por casualidad, Kiryong descubrió el secreto más profundo de su amiga y debido a esto su corazón empezó a latir, ¿serán latidos de miedo o amor?
description.pt-br: Yang Kiryong é um garoto comum do ensino médio que tem uma colega de classe chamada Yoo Jae-Kyung, que é um pouco desajeitada e sem noção. Ambos têm uma amizade muito boa, mas sem nenhum tipo de atração amorosa. Até que um dia, por acaso, Kiryong descobriu o segredo mais profundo de sua amiga. Por causa disso seu coração começou a bater, será de medo ou de amor?

description.en:
Serena is the only heir to the Serenity family. To save her endangered family, her grandmother married her to the most hated man in the kingdom. The only thing that can comfort Serena, who was collapsing, is her lover, Friedrich.

The story of three people intertwined with hot hatred and love.

Kyuho Je wants out.

Hot, rich, and with a plan, he's looking to get out of his family's multinational mega corporation because, seriously, business is boring. He'll need help to make more money quick — and savvy money launderer Kangha Nam is perfect for the job!

But it's not easy keeping Kangha close with paparazzi and family constantly on watch, and Kyuho will need more than kidnapping and contracts to keep him in his grasp.

Will he get more (and want more) than he bargained for?
description.es-la:
Kangha Nam, también conocido como “pitufo”, es un aspirante a lavador de dinero y es justo lo que Kyuho Je, CEO de una empresa millonaria, necesita. Así que Kyuho hace lo que haría cualquiera: secuestra a Kangha y le obliga a firmar un contrato según el cual, este debe trabajar para él de ahora en adelante. Y eso no es todo, está con él 24/7, le otorga un puesto falso en su empresa, e incluso le deja mudarse con él. Y eso sólo para evitar heredar la empresa de su padre. Para no levantar sospechas sobre las actividades ilegales de Kangha y explicar su repentina aparición en la vida de Kyuho, ambos entablan una relación falsa, por la que Kangha recibe una buena paga.
¿Podrán los dos engañar a todo el mundo y lograr el objetivo de Kyuho? ¿Y hasta qué punto es una farsa su relación?

altTitles.vi: Fairy Tail Nhiệm vụ Trăm năm

altTitles.th: แฟรี่เทล ภาคเควส 100 ปี ตอนที่

altTitles.ja: フェアリーテイル １００年クエスト

altTitles.zh-hk: 妖精的尾巴 百年任務

description.en:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
description.ru: Продолжение популярной манги "Хвост Феи" или "Фейри Тейл", которая будет носить отдельное название "100 летний квест"! После победы над Зерефом нашу любимую, еще более сильную гильдию, ждет новое приключение! Не пропустите новые приключения популярных героев!

altTitles.ja: ふだじょ！～乙女召喚脱衣大戦～

altTitles.zh-hk: 卡片少女召唤脱衣大战
召唤卡片少女脱衣大战

altTitles.en: Card Girl!: Maiden Summoning Undressing Wars

description.en: A world where cute girls become cards and fight. And it's terrifying (happy?). In other words, you have to get the other girl to take off her clothes. Use the girls, who materialize from the cards, and their intelligence and strength to win! If you win, the other girl card is yours! A harem is not a dream.

altTitles.ja: ヤンデレちゃん×ネガティブちゃん

description.en: Collection of one/two-pagers from the author's Twitter featuring specific characters

altTitles.ja: 化物語

description.en: Koyomi Araragi, a third-year high school student, manages to survive a vampire attack with the help of Meme Oshino, a strange man residing in an abandoned building. Though being saved from vampirism and now a human again, several side effects such as superhuman healing abilities and enhanced vision still remain. Regardless, Araragi tries to live the life of a normal student, with the help of his friend and the class president, Tsubasa Hanekawa. When fellow classmate Hitagi Senjougahara falls down the stairs and is caught by Araragi, the boy realizes that the girl is unnaturally weightless. Despite Senjougahara's protests, Araragi insists he help her, deciding to enlist the aid of Oshino, the very man who had once helped him with his own predicament. Through several tales involving demons and gods, Bakemonogatari follows Araragi as he attempts to help those who suffer from supernatural maladies.
description.ru: Арараги Коёми — с виду самый обычный школьник — однажды поднимался по лестнице. Неожиданно на него сверху падает его одноклассница, Хитаги Сэндзёгахара — молчаливая и нелюдимая. Уже было подставив руки, паренек приготовился упасть вместе с девушкой, но та оказалась не тяжелее школьного учебника… Через какое-то время Коёми понял: несмотря на образ, который сложился за долгое время, Сэндзёгахара молчит совсем не из-за скромности! Больно крутой и дерзкий характер у нее оказался. А ещё она легко и быстро достает буквально из воздуха острые предметы — школьные канцтовары. Но и сам Арараги оказался не слишком прост. Он рассказал, что сам до недавнего времени был вампиром, и выручил его один знакомый — Мэмэ Ошино. Не поймешь, святой или просто старый хиппи… Он объяснил: над Хитаги кто-то подшутил. И этот кто-то — бог. Ну, а что делать обычному герою? Помогать девушкам в беде, конечно же! А их таких о-очень много…
description.pt-br: Koyomi Araragi, um estudante do terceiro ano, que é quase humano novamente depois de se tornar por um breve período um vampiro. Um dia, uma colega de classe chamada Hitagi Senjogahara, que vergonhosamente nunca fala com ninguém, cai da escada nos braços de Koyomi. Ele descobre que Hitagi não possui peso nenhum, um desafio a física. Apesar de ter sido ameaçado por ela, Koyomi oferece sua ajuda, e apresenta a Meme Oshino, um homem sem-teto de meia-idade que o ajudou a deixar de ser um vampiro.

title.en: That Time I Got a Black-Haired Gyaru Behind Me When I Changed Seats

altTitles.ja: 席替えしたら後ろの席が黒髪ギャルだった件

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekigae Shitara Ushiro no Seki ga Kurokami Gal Datta Ken

title.en: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転生したらあかりだけスライムだった件

altTitles.en: That Time Only Akari Got Reincarnated as a Slime

description.en: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world… and Akari turns into a slime. A new Yuru Yuri isekai spinoff.

altTitles.ja: THE GAMER

altTitles.th: เซียนเกม นอกจอ

description.en:
What if your life is just like playing a game? What if you can upgrade your status and gain more levels? A fantasy world is coming right at you!  
  
Han Jee-Han, a normal high school student, suddenly develops a special power where his entire world is shifted into a game-like setting. He can see the power levels of people, look at the stats of a seemingly normal item, get abilities, and even level up! Follow Han Jee-Han as he discovers how to use this power, and maybe even where it came from.
description.fr:
Et si votre vie ressemblait à un jeu vidéo et si vous pouviez améliorer vos stats et gagner plus de niveaux ?

---

description.id:
Bagaimana kalau hidupmu seperti bermain game? Bagaimana kalau kamu bisa meningkatkan status dan levelmu dengan melakukan berbagai hal sehari-hari? Dunia penuh fantasi akan datang padamu!

description.ja:
ある日突然、現実がゲームの世界になったら⁉️

description.ko:
이유도 모른 채 현실이 게임처럼 뒤바뀐다면 어떻게 될까?
레벨이 오르고, 스테이터스를 올릴 수 있다면?
게임이 되어 버린 현실 속 모험기

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=152)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=495)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000901)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=1883)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=319)
description.ru:
Обычным дням школьной жизни пришёл конец с тех пор, как, из-за сильных пристрастий к MMORPG и другим компьютерным играм, обычный игроман и посредственный ученик Хан Чжи Хан был одарён «богиней Геей» сверхъестественным даром под ироничным названием «Игрок». Теперь он стал игровым персонажем в реальной жизни и может прокачивать уровень, тем самым повышая свои навыки так, как сам того желает. Только из-за этого «дара свыше» он оказался втянут в Бездну, мир полный сверхъестественных созданий и опасностей, которые будут преследовать его. По этой причине герой должен максимально быстро качать свой уровень и изучать новые способности, чтобы противостоять тем, кто попытается ему навредить, так как в Бездне это обычное явление. Но, к счастью, его лучший друг уже давно является частью Бездны и всеми силами помогает ему не умереть раньше времени. А вот что ждёт героя впереди, к чему приведёт его судьба и воля Геи, какова будет его роль в Бездне и чего он сможет добиться в познании своих сил, мы увидим в его дальнейших приключениях.

จะเป็นเช่นไรถ้าชีวิตคุณเหมือนกับการเล่นเกม? จะเป็นเช่นไรถ้าคุณสามารถเพิ่มค่าสเตตัสและอัพเลเวลได้? โลกแฟนตาซีเหนือจินตนาการกำลังพุ่งมาหาตรงหน้าคุณแล้ว!

description.zh:
当游戏的规则
套入玩家们的现实生活？

平凡的高中生韩志汉从某个瞬间开始像是在玩线上角色扮演游戏一样，可以看见人们头顶上标有的记号和等级，这到底是怎么一回事？

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=152)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/the-gamer/list?title_no=232)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=495)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000901)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=1883)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/the-gamer/list?title_no=319)
description.zh-hk:
平凡的高中生韓志漢從某個瞬間開始像是在玩線上角色扮演遊戲一樣看得見周圍每個人的頭頂上都標記著的特技和等級，甚至連幫忙跑腿的工作也變成像在遊戲中執行任務的模式，然後突然間他真的像從遊戲裡走出來的人一樣擁有了神奇的超能力并且能夠和其他玩家戰鬥，他的人生開始變成了一場遊戲。 日本的《刀劍神域》將原本電腦遊戲中的規則套入了玩家們的現實生活中，而《遊俠》這部作品則將主角原本平凡無奇的人生變得像遊戲一樣夢幻神奇，主角擁有了可以看到其他人的能力值和等級的能力後，他開始慢慢地開發自己的技能及等級，過程中也享受到彷彿在遊戲裡『練功』的樂趣。

altTitles.ja: 空手バカ異世界

description.en:
A karate practitioner who has been transferred to another world refuses the cheat skills given by the goddess and he pursues his own karate in another world.  

Note: The title, Karate Baka Isekai, is a parody of the Manga, Karate Master (Karate Baka Ichidai). It doesn't mean he's an idiot. 
  
Original WN (Kakuyomu): <https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054884503755>
4-koma based on the mobile game Guns Girl Z (Houkai Gakuen / Houkai Gakuen 2).

altTitles.ja: ウェディングピーチ

description.en:
During the time artist Nao Yazawa was drawing [her original Wedding Peach series](https://mangadex.org/title/13e39275-7b8b-4b70-a758-1314392e0e48/wedding-peach), she was also producing comics for the Japanese monthly magazine Shogaku Sannen-sei ("Elementary School Third Grader"). These stories, roughly paralleling the original Wedding Peach storyline, feature younger characters aimed at a younger audience.

Wedding Peach: Young Love is a collection of these often-overlooked episodes. Fans of the original series will be tickled to see their favorite characters, both hero and villain, recast in this warm and fuzzy alternate adventure.

Yazawa even throws in a few new characters for readers to fall in love with. There's the demon trio of Blitz, Cloud and Noise and a few more Jama folk, too. Together, they join Wedding Peach and her heavenly crew for one final tussle between good and evil.
___
The series was only published in volume form outside Japan, and was released as "Volume 7" of [the original series](https://mangadex.org/title/13e39275-7b8b-4b70-a758-1314392e0e48/wedding-peach) in some countries.

If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!

Helmut was a child who had been abandoned in the Demonic Beast Forest at birth.
Raised by Demonic Beasts, the first human that he met was the Sword Saint Darien.
Little did Helmut know that the chance encounter would soon shake the foundation of his fate…

“Grow stronger If you want to get out of here.”

The boy who’d lived like a beast was thrown into the human world!
He possessed overwhelming swordsmanship, outstanding looks and sharp intelligence, but there was one thing he lacked: humanity.

I am no longer a prey. I am now a predator!
description.fr: Helmut était un enfant qui avait été abandonné dans la foret des bêtes magiques a sa naissance. Elevé par des bêtes magiques, le premier humain qu’il a rencontré était le saint de l’épée Darien. Helmut était loin de se douter que cette rencontre fortuite allait bientôt ébranler les fondements de son destin… ‘Deviens plus fort si tu veux sortir d’ici’ Le garçon qui avait vécu comme une bête était jeté dans le monde des humains ! Il possédait une habileté au sabre impressionnante, une apparence exceptionnelle et une intelligence aiguisée, mais il lui manquait une chose : l’humanité. Je ne suis plus une proie. Je suis maintenant un prédateur !

title.en: This is Obviously a Yuri Manhua

altTitles.zh-ro: Ru ni suo jian zhe shi baihe man

altTitles.fr: En effet, il s'agit d'un yuri

description.en:
When the timid Wu You moves to a new high school, she quickly grows attached to her new deskmate, the gregarious Ye Yin. But there is more than meets the eye with Ye Yin, and as the days pass, Wu You's feelings begin to deepen.   
A love story between two secondary school classmates.  

Author's Lofter: [占](https://zhan6019.lofter.com/)
Author's Weibo: [@这里是占](https://www.weibo.com/u/6016748885)

altTitles.th: สามรั่วตัวแสบ

altTitles.ja: みつどもえ

description.en: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.

altTitles.ja: コーヒームーン

description.en: The light is gone. Unable to escape the darkness, Pieta repeats the same day. Every day she walks to school down the same road, through the same rain, then has the same conversation with her friend Danae. Eventually, she finds happiness in the repetition. The days carry on as normal, until one day, her routine chat with Danae takes a different turn: "What?! You can remember the today that happened yesterday too?" Despite their bleak situation, the girls reach towards tomorrow!

altTitles.fr: Le régresseur de la famille déchue

description.en:
A life filled with regrets.

Once he realized his faults and decided to lead a new life, it was too late. His family was already gone.

He had borne through each day with pure rage. Finally at the end of his misery, his wish reached the heavens—an unforgiven one.

He goes against fate to raise his sword.
description.ko:
후회로만 가득한 생.

스스로의 잘못을 깨닫고 다시 사람이 되고자 했을 때,
이미 가문은 불타 사라진 뒤였다.

발악 같은 분노로 하루하루 연명하던 삶.
그 절망의 끝에서, 간절한 염원이 하늘에 닿았다.

용서받지 못한 자.
운명을 거슬러 검을 들다.

description.en: To uncover her brother’s death, she must betray the person she loves. Lee Sunwoo, a live-in trainer who infiltrates to uncover the truth, and Seo Mundo, an arrogant but charming third-generation conglomerate. A hot love affair between two people who keep getting entangled yet are unable to part ways.

Jian Chen, the publicly recognized number one expert of the Jianghu. His skill with the sword went beyond perfection and was undefeatable in battle, After a battle with the exceptional expert Dugu Qiubai who had gone missing over a hundred years ago, Jian Chen succumbed to his injuries and died. After death, Jian Chen’s spirit was transmigrated into a completely foreign world. Following an extremely fast growth, his enemies piled up one after another before becoming gravely injured once more. On the gates of death, his spirit had mutated, and from that moment henceforth, he would tread on a completely different path of the art of the sword to become the sword god of his generation

title.en: Sacchan to Ken-chan wa Kyou mo Itteru

altTitles.en: Sacchan and Ken-chan Are Going at it Again

altTitles.ja: さっちゃんとけんちゃんは今日もイってる

description.en: University student Kenta is excited to be going out with the quiet but beautiful Sachiko. Six months into their relationship, a side of Sachiko other than her "ladylike" side becomes apparent. The more you know about her, the more you fall in love with her.
description.ja: 物静かな美人・幸子と付き合うことになり、舞い上がる男子大学生・賢太。 付き合って半年後、明らかになる”おしとやか”だけじゃない彼女の一面に!? 知れば知るほど好きになる、イケメン彼女と乙女な彼氏のイってる系エロコメディ開幕!!

altTitles.tr: Cross-dressing yaparken, yakışıklı bir adam beni yürüttü

altTitles.ru: Пока я был переодет в женскую одежду, ко мне пристал красивый парень!

altTitles.zh: 女装上街闲逛被帅哥搭讪了

altTitles.ja: イケメン女子と女装男子

altTitles.en: While Cross-Dressing, I Was Hit on by a Handsome Guy!

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou Shite Machi ni Kuridashitara Ikemen ni Nanpa Sareru Manga

description.en: While cross-dressing, I was hit on by a handsome guy, except he wasn't actually a handsome guy!
description.tr: Ceza olarak crossdressing yaparken yakışıklı bir adamla karşılaştım ve işi pişirdi.
description.pt-br: Por causa de uma brincadeira eu acabei tendo de me vestir de menina, então, sai às ruas, e nesse dia, acabei conhecendo alguém e minha vida está para mudar.

title.en: Reincarnation Path of The Underworld King

altTitles.en: The Descent of the Underworld King

description.en: The underworld has collapsed. In the barren land where blood should flow, now clear water flows, and the cauldron that used to boil the souls has long since gone cold. The retired King of Underworld, in pursuit of his own happiness, seeks the path of reincarnation. However, due to the chaos in Underworld and the disappearance of his successor, he is unable to walk the path of reincarnation. To become a god in the human world and to track down the missing successor, The King of Underworld descends to the human world. But the human world is in chaos due to the escape of the deceased from Hell, orchestrated by his successor’s masterful plan. The King of Underworld joins forces with the ‘Guardians of the Life’ who protect humans, using the power of the Hell’s ledger, in a struggle to capture his successor and restore the world to its original state. Will King of Underworld be able to safely walk the path of reincarnation?

Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.

altTitles.ja: ドラゴン娘のどこでもないゾーン

description.en:
Five dragon girls without an ounce of sense between them. Going nowhere at the breakneck pace of 4 panels per page.

This is the Dragon Girls' Nowhere Zone.

altTitles.ja: タルタロス劇場ワイルド

description.en: Collection of 4-komas centered around Persona 3, 4, 5 and their various spinoff games.

The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?

altTitles.en: The best medical god in the city

description.en: "Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously." Five years later, that Ye Family trash is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky！”

altTitles.ja: 望郷太郎

description.en:
A man awakes alone after 500 years of hibernation, his family & his belongings lost to a severe cold. 
In a devastated land he searches for new meaning in life. 
(Source: Twitter)
description.ja:
大寒波襲来。世界初期化。五百年の眠りから覚めた舞鶴太郎は、「生きがい」を求めて祖国日本へと旅立つ。
「ヒト」の歴史をさかのぼり、理想の「暮らし」を追い求めるグレートジャーニー。

title.en: Shin Megami Tensei Apocrypha: War of the Dove

altTitles.ja-ro: Shin Megami Tensei Gaiten - Hato no Senki

altTitles.ja: 真・女神転生外典 鳩の戦記

description.en: A standalone story set in the larger Megami Tensei universe. Our hero Hato is just an ordinary schoolboy, until one day he receives a ~~Command Spell~~ Stigma on his left hand, forges a contract with ~~Lancer~~ Cu Chulainn to become his master, and is unwittingly dragged into a city-wide Holy ~~Grail~~ War.

altTitles.en: I Rely on Rewarding Apprentices to Upgrade

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Kao Da Shang Tudi Shengji

description.en: The master is driving the crane west, what should I do if the enemy comes to the door? ! Awaken the apprenticeship rebate system, the more you give to your apprentice, the more you get back to your master! Hahaha, good disciples, hurry up, as a teacher, you never hide your secrets!

title.en: I Can Use the Card Drawing System to Summon Beautiful Girls

altTitles.zh: 我能用抽卡系统召唤美少女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Neng Yong Chou Ka Xitong Zhaohuan Mei Shaonv

description.en: “It’s a disaster! I’ve been taken over by a mysterious card-drawing system and found myself surrounded by adorable girls in a mobile game! What’s even more terrifying is that among them is the antagonist sister sent by the Demon King from another world to hunt me down. What should I do? Seeking urgent advice online!”
